name: Checkers. Free
description:
Checkers / English Draughts

Checkers or English Draughts is the latest addition to the Tesko Gaming’s Classics Re-invented game range aiming to make iOS games the way they are really meant to be – simple, instinctive and massively fun.

Another well-known, addictive and top-shelf-fun board game with Tesko Gaming’s trademark simple and ergonomic design, you can choose to play against the computer or against a friend.

Track scores (against friends and bots), wins, losses and other statistics with easy and intuitive layout and instant access.

Capture all the enemy pieces and win the game – it is as simple as that. Master the game and become the King of Checkers.

NOTE: Checkers’ rules of play are same with the standard English Draughts rules

Checkers offers the following features:

• One or two human players
• Three levels of difficulty
• Great graphics and sound effects
• Piece moving hints
• Undo & Redo functions
• Statistics
• History of all games
• Instructions
